Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Mechlorethamine hydrochloride is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Mycosis fungoides (a type of cutaneous T-cell lymphoma). It is used in patients with stage I disease who have had treatment to the skin.

Section.Para: Mechlorethamine hydrochloride is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
